def solve(array):
    count = {}
    for c in array:
        count[c] = count.get(c,0) + 1
    res = 0
    for v in count.values():
        res += (v+1) / 2
    return res

def buy1_get1():
    T = int(raw_input())
    for t in xrange(T):
        array = raw_input().strip()
        print solve(array)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    buy1_get1()
